channel.title: Changing the Text color on a Deltascape client
channel.description:
Hello, Well, my dillemma is that i can not find where the text color is in the client files. I was wondering if anyone knew where the text color is and you would like to help me out real quick. Any help is greatly appreciated and thank you.
Weownzscape.

item.title: Changing the Text color on a Deltascape client
item.dc:creator: @klorox klorox
item.description:
@klorox wrote:

Like the color of your chat text? Or the loading bar text?

Read full topic
item.source: Changing the Text color on a Deltascape client
